content.detailedDescription:
I didn't realize it was there while taking this picture but noticed it about a month later while reviewing my pics for editing and filing.
these pics are a copy of the original and enlargements out of the original. the original pic taken with a nikon coolpix 8700.
i wish i could say more about this sighting.
content.summary: I didn't realize it was there but noticed it about a month later while reviewing my pics.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on almshouse road heading into newtown.I was about a quarter mile away from the intersection of rt.232. it was a sunny day with no clouds in the sky.I had been looking up at the sky and had noticed birds and some aircraft flying several minutes prior to seeing the object.I then looked up at the sun and to its right,was what looked like a bright star in the sky.It looked really peculiar like it was out of place.The object was stationary and then began to move to the right,stopped-to the left,stopped and completely disappeared.This all happened in under a minute.This was not an aircraft due to the fact that it moved and stopped so fast.I felt no fear-before, during or after the event.I felt very peaceful while watching this object.
content.summary: Star like object moving strangely

content.detailedDescription: Caught this one at webcamufo.Com this morning ufo spotted in phoenix  http://webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Ufo spotted in phoenix  http://webcamufo.Com

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving down highway 540 and had just passed springdale going south when i noticed two lights about 3 miles south. at first i thought it was an airplane butbit wasn't moving. then i thought it was a really tall cell tower but as i approached i didn't see the tower only the lights about 500 feet in the air.  as i passed under them it looked a bit like the bottom of a plane except the only lights were on the outer tips and were white and the fact that it wasn't moving.
once i passed it i looked back a few times and i didn't move. then i was out of sight.
content.summary: Was driving dow highway and see to white lights like the bottom of airplane bit did not move stayed about 500 feet above ground

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a un mandated military mission in haiti during the summer of 2004.  we were living in modular tents in a field at the port au prince airport.  sometime during the night, i got up to use the washroom (a port o potty at the end of my row of tents).  when i rolled out of my tent i was facing towards the runway.  we had guard towers and a concentina barrier facing the runway.  beyond the runway about a km away was a concrete wall, beyond that a shanty town and then beyond that the mountains.  if i was facing left, it would be the same thing but looking towards the bay.

when i rolled out of the tent, i noticed a bright dome like light over the shanty town.  it was a soft glow and almost looked like a dome encircling an area of about 1km left and right of arc.  it lasted for a couple of minutes and then disappeared.

their were several witnesses to the event and the next morning we couldnt really explain it.  it wasent a fire or a strobe light or a beacon. were familiar with explosions and it wasnt that or gunfire.  it was quiet too.
content.summary: Weird sighting over haiti

content.detailedDescription:
This morning i was driving south from northern chicago suburbs, looked up at clear blue sky and saw a bright silver, oval shaped object, not moving. from my perspective, it was about the size of an elongated quarter. looked around to see if it was perhaps a plane as location of object appeared to be just east of o'hare airport. determined it was not a plane, as i witnessed in comparison 3 moving planes of varying size, distance and direction at same time. this was not an airplane. it stayed stationary for perhaps 8 seconds, then vanished.  
i drive in this direction everyday at this time, and have done so for past 2 years, andh have never seen anything like it before. very peculiar.
content.summary: Strange sight in sky over chicago tuesday morning

content.detailedDescription:
i was coming home from church and pulling up to my subdivision when i saw a couple acting strangely and running to their van.  this was at the corner of stonebridge and goff farm road.  i continued to drive to my house, pulled in the garage and shut the door.  i wanted to see if they were anywhere around, so i went to my front porch to take a look around.  that is when i saw the strange lights in the sky towards the south-southwest.
     that's when i realized that the people i saw must have been outside watching this as well.  i thought it was just a plane at first, but then it started lighting up with multi-colored but predominately red and blue chasing lights in a circular fashion.  it was mesmerizing and very large.  to the right of the object, there was a series of white diagonal lights extending towards the ground that seemed to stay in the same place as the saucer-like object was lighting up.  
     this lasted a really long time (about 15 minutes).  i tried to call my husband and tell him about it, but i couldn't get a hold of him.  i ran back outside and much to my disbelief it was still there.  when i ran back inside a second time, i came back out and it was gone.  all the lights were gone, including the white diagonal lights.
content.summary: A large saucer-shaped object was seen which contained multi-colored chasing lights and was accompanied with diagonal white lights toward the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on the grass right outside my house. it not that surrounded by houses because we own a farm. as i was laying on my grass half way to sleep (because i usually do that) i thaught my borther was shining light against my face and so i got mad at him and i wanted to punch him but i found out that he wasn't there. i saw to the sky and there was this big triangle object and it looked like if it was pretty close. i just started to freak out and i was speachless. since i was alone in my dads farm i had no idea what to do. i wanted to call someone police department but they were going to think that i was crazy. well i was about 3 mins away from my house and i didn't know what to do but just stay still so maybe they wont see me. the light turned off just by a little when it was in the middle and that was when my heart literally felt like if it was pounding. they stood there for a few seconds and they it fanished like a flick of an eye.. please help me i really do need help. whats going on!?
content.summary: it was trinanguler and it had a large amount of energy source through light.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down cr 321 towards tennessee colony, saw large lights in sky, next to star lights were huge very bright, have never seen plane or helicopter with lights this large. i worked at private aircraft hanger and am used to large number of planes. no noise, just 2 huge white lights in middle and red light on one end, green light on other end. all same size. tried to pull over to look, by the time i stopped lights were gone, less than one minute. i have no idea what i saw because to size of lights would be larger than search lights & brighter, don't know how lights disappeared so quickly.
content.summary: Large craft with huge lights, 2 white in middle, red on one end,green on other end

content.detailedDescription:
This thing looked just like the moon,only with no gray,just white.There was no noise,no other colors,and perhaps as little as 20 yards in width.It moved very quickly,when it chose to,and slowly,at other times.I had a strong impression that it wanted me to come outside,which scared me.I did not go outside.At one point,it got as close as it seemed possible to the glass of our sliding doors as it could,the light of it was creepy,as it completely flooded the living room.I was very afraid.My 8 year old daughter was crying,she thought it was trying to get in,i just thought it wanted me or us to go out.It was out there for a very long time,well over an hour.Moving up,down,back,forward.All silent,but seemingly,with a consience .My three other children were in their beds,and i finally began to get angry at the thing,the intrusion,the possible threat,though,i really did not sense a threat,but was unsure of any intent.Eventually,i chose to ignore it.I closed the blinds.I thought the thing was playing with me.
i have only told one other person about that night,a close neighbor.He nor his family had seen it,my daughter remembers it,but chooses not to speak of it,other than between us two.My husband,who worked nights,at the time,saw nothing on his way home that night,so i assume it left,at least by 2 am.
this happened 20 years ago.I was very much awake,waiting for my daughter to become sleepy,so as to put her to bed also,so i could clean up and go to sleep myself.I have never seen anything like that from that time.I have never used drugs,been accused of having an over active mind,or any other delusion.
         i will always believe,now,in other unknown life.
content.summary: The " moon " was hanging around outside my deck

content.detailedDescription: I very frequently watch the skies on any clear night and last night i saw something awesome. i could barely make it out with the naked eye but nonetheless they were still there.  my wife and i also observed these through some 10x50 binoculars too.  they were definetly out of focus but easier to see with the binoculars.  for over two hours they just danced around, kinda hanging in the same vicinity checkin out everything.  when they would move they could do so slow like or they could stretch.  like you could see one blur of light in the scope then it would stretch out like a spider-web and either reappear in the new location or go right back to where it was, almost like there were two of the same thing. i saw up to four at once in the binoculars.  i hit them with my spotlight a bit and they reacted but not much, i didnt get to talk to them. i could see many shooting star-like movements in the sky too, golden colored that leave trails of light behind them in the same areas and time-frame.  the blurry ufos or probes or whatever they were werent that far away from me either, i would say half a mile, seemed like they were in my yard but it was hard to tell.  my wife freaked out about it.
content.summary: This wasn't necessarily two lights, but more of a blurred reflection of all the light around maybe?

content.detailedDescription: I work graveyard so i am always up late at night even on my days off. i was outside of my apartment smoking a cigarette just looking at the stars and the moon. when i looked out and noticed that something drifting towards my building. at first i thought it was maybe like a tarp or something but as it got closer i noticed it was a triangle shaped craft with seven lights no bigger than a fighter jet. one at the tip of the craft and three at going down each side to the end of the craft. the lights were orange or more of a dim orange. the craft also had what appeared to be a "friend" with it it was just a single light that was traveling just behind it. neither craft made any noise, and they were not very high at all i've seen buildings that are taller than these crafts were high. the airport isn't very far from my place but what i saw was no airplane. i work near the airport and see all sorts of planes coming and going and i can assure you it was not an airplane, at least not one that the common sitizen knows about. the whole event lasted about thirty second to minute. the craft(s) just sort of cruised over my place moving in a staight line like you would cruise down a side street. and the only thing i could think about was "no one is going to belive me".
content.summary: Jet sized triangle shaped craft  with seven lights and a friend

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 19:15 hours on october 20th 2008 i went out on my second story apartment balcony which faces north/northwest to have a cigarette.  gazing east/northeast i observed a string of dark red lights in a boomerang formation travelling southeast to northwest.  the lights never changed formation leading me to speculate they were not individual objects but that they belonged to a singular object.  the light appeared to blink in a tip-to-tip sequence, alternating starting points.
 
 the object was occluded from my view after about 30 seconds due to a very large tree in my building courtyard, so i moved to the other side of the porch hoping that the object's path would allow it to be visible on the other side of the tree.  it unfortunately was not.

i did however continue to gaze into the sky hoping maybe it would appear.  about 5 or 10 minutes after the initial sighting, i happened to look back in the direction i originally saw the object only to see it again or an identical object traveling in the same exact  path as the first object.  i would estimate this sighting was the same duration, my view being once again occluded by the large tree. this second object as it passed seemed to me to be followed by one or two aircraft.  whether these were jet or helicopter i am not certain.  
  
i am no aviation expert but having lived in this area for over two years i am quite accustomed to hearing and seeing commercial jets and private headed for lax or burbank pass over my building.  had this object been one of these judging from its size, it would have been extremely low and emitting very loud engine noise.  there was no discernible noise coming from these objects.
my wife who would have normally been here is away on business so i was the sole witness to this event unfortunately.
content.summary: two very large boomerang shaped objects seen in encino ca

content.detailedDescription: i dont type or spell well so bare with me . i had just picked up my 6 yr old son from sitter .We were sitting at a stop light and my son said look at the ufo daddy i giggled and said were son and he pointed out my window and sure enough there it was . shiney fat disk just sitting in the air kind of pulsating from the sun light i grabed my cellphone and got some 10 second video . then i reset my phone and started to video again light turned green and had to go then it took off pretty quick . and a few days ago i was at the same intersection and sence it happend before i allways look into the sky there and there it was again i took cell phone picture of it i can send that to u i can allso text cell phone movie too.
content.summary: Just sat in the air  then moved off into clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on the 280 fyw going to san francisco, i was about 10 miles from s f airport & i saw the airplanes taking off from air port & as i was seeing the airplanes on the sky i saw an strip of lights, they where i will say about 200 ft long & all together were about 20 to 25 lights, they were moving from side to side, at the begining i tought that that was an air plane but i saw the air planes close to the lights & it was bigger than the air planes, as i was driving the lights went behind the clouds & i lost them.
i was very excited to see them, unfotunately i was driving & i couldn't stop to take a picture.
content.summary: Strip of lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on portola drive and looked up into the cloud cover just at the instant a semicircular laser flash shone through the marine layer. i was the only observer. one month ago i saw a huge disk at about the same location doing a laser flash and disappearing. the day after this second event, military and other helicopters were scouring that same patch of sky for hours. how do i feel about it? i am still recovering from the first sighting and just hope i am not being singled out for something. my job puts me in the right places and times for these sightings so i am thinking it must be that. i have been having some street lamp interference events lately so i have been looking up a lot.
content.summary: Semi circular lazer flash

content.detailedDescription: I was observing the sky with a near infrared webcam, taped to a 10x pair of binoculars, when i observed a ufo.  the ufo appeared to react to my observation of it, but immediately speeding off into the clouds (which is eerie, but i was outside on the deck, and obviously it could see me).
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Using ir webcam taped to 10x binoculars, observed ufo speeding off

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 4:30 am on friday morning on october 10, 2008. i heard a loud nose that woke me up. a banging noise i associated as a car with a flat tire. my daughters also heard the noise and others in my neighborhood but they all went back to sleep.
then i heard military jets flying very low. sounded something like the blue angels flying over my house. i got up and looked out the back door. it was cloudy but i thought i saw an oval shaped thing far up in the sky blinking around in a circle. multicolored, looked like a 1970's christmas tree topper. i went to get my glasses and looked back in the same place and it was gone. then over the tree tops i saw what looked like a flock of canadian geese flying over the tree tops. they had a blue glow around them and it seemed as if they had mirrored wings flapping. as they got closer i could see it was not birds. the thing was flying very low, and slowly, silent, just above the tree tops. i stared for a few seconds when i realized it was not birds it scared me so i shut the door. 
a few seconds later i opened the door again and it was hovering over my garage.
about 20 feet away and about 100 (maybe 200) or so feet in the air above my garage. i am not good with estimating measurments but it was very close.
i saw a lot of detail on this thing. it was about half an acre in size based on the lots in my neighborhhod. a hovering v-shaped warehouse. amazing. as it hovered, i felt as if it were showing off, like "hey i see you, look at me". it was incredible. beautiful.
i stared for a good 5 minutes. awe struck with fear. i can describe this thing in good detail if anyone is interested. if this is some kind of aurora secret plane, our military thing, thy should be proud and tell the world. if our government made this thing, you should be proud.  it was incredible. words can not describe what i saw. it was a v formation of lights flickering like mirrored birds. they was a triangle shaped platform above the orbs but they were not connected to it. it was completely silent as i remember but maybe a low hum or whirl noise. it was beautiful. heavenly. so bright i could barely look at it. i will never forget october 10, 2008 4:50 am as long as i am on this earth. i live about 2 city blocks from llyod expressway and about a half mile from i 164 on the eastside of evansville. this thing was flying to the southwest very slow and low. it looked like it would have came from chandler/newburgh area, flew over the east side, then maybe crossed old newburgh road after it left my house and went over the river in the direction of henderson.
if anyone else saw something that looked liked blue glowing canada geese flying in formation or a v-shape object or a blue/gray triangle flying over i 164 or the lloyd expressway on friday oct. 10 4:30-4:50 am, please tell mufon. if anyone else in plaza meadows subdivision saw it, please tell mufon so i know. strange to think i am the only person who saw this. the neighbors i spoke to heard the loud bangs and the military jets but they did not look outside. please contact jerry sievers from vincennes mufon if you saw anything on friday october 10, 2008 about 4:30 am . thanks.
content.summary: It hover about 100-200 feet above me for 5 minutes until i got scared and shut the door.

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from in louisville, turned off of interstate 64 to the lawerceburg exit. traveling on road that connects to us highway 127, very clear blue sky few clouds nice day. enjoying drive when out the corner of my eye on the right upper side of windsheild noticed a reflecting object. i slowed down to see what type of aircraft it might be, since alot of my family are retired airforce personal.It had no wings or propelers,as i got a good look at it from 100-150 feet off the ground. i was shocked to see a silver shine disc circle shape, not moving but hovering in the air. lasted not even a minute,when i finally was getting a 100% accuate identification the object shot off straight up.  shocked i slowed down almost to a stop,trying to find the object. again and again looking everywhere it disapeared. no clouds where in the area around my sighting all i could see was couple low flying birds.  one hour before while in louisville i saw two airplanes and a low flying traffic helicopter. the weird unknown object didn't fly or look anything like what i previously saw just 1 hour before. i've seen many flying machines from blimps,balloons and airplanes&choppers.But this incident was strange and exceiting.It all was so fast i didn't get time to take a picture from my cell phone. this is my 100% truthful account of the events as it happened!
content.summary: Extreme shine from sun reflection

content.detailedDescription:
Around 4:30 am i was standing in a parking lot in pomona, ca that was dimly lit. i was looking up at the sky and admiring the big and little dipper. 

just then i noticed two stars, both the same brightness as the stars in the big dipper. they were just to the left of the big dipper, one almost directly above the other, starting to move in an upward direction. i have seen satellites in the desert and they move across the sky in an arcing pattern from either left to right or vice versa, so this was really unusual.

these two stars continued moving slowly upward and finally became fainter and fainter until they both disappeared at the same time. this took all of about 30-45 seconds from the time they started moving upward to the time they disappeared.

i have seen airplanes at night coming in on a flight path and their lights, as the plane is coming at you or going by you, get brighter. these two lights just got dimmer and disappeared...As if they were going straight up into outerspace.

i don't know what to make of it, but it sure was odd!
content.summary: Two stars, one above the other, next to the big dipper started moving upward & disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My father and aunt were out taking pictures of the country side for my aunt to make into a painting. they snap two quick picks of a nice looking spot by a small lake called mud lake. when they looked at the pictures, they saw a large spherical reddish blob and a smaller blue orb just beneath it.
content.summary: Two photos taken, but photographers didn't notice the objects when taken

content.detailedDescription:
On october 15 about 9 p.M., i was sitting on the front porch, looking at the stars when a bright-white light streaked horizontally across the sky at due north. the light appeared suddenly from a point below a very bright star and terminated below the next very bright star. (sorry, i don't know astronomy so i don't know which stars. according to a constellation map i looked at, they could have been the two lower stars in the great square of pegasus.) it lasted only a second or two. 

as far as distance, the only way i can explain it is this:  if i hold my hands above my head at the same spot where i saw this flash, the distance between my hands would be about two feet.

the light was very bright, much like that given off by a sparkler. it did not resemble a meteor at all, especially because it maintained a horizontal course and did not arc or bobble. 

i associated its sudden appearance and disappearance with acceleration. it reminded me of all the sci-fi movies i've seen where the captain orders warp speed, leaving only a flash of the ship behind before its sudden disappearance.

i immediately telephoned my neighbor, who is a member of the local mufon chapter. she interviewed me, asking very specific questions, about what i had seen. she believed it was a ufo.

my first reaction to the sighting was bewilderment. ("what the hell was that???") shortly thereafter, i realized the sighting was in the same general area (due north) as unexplained round flashes (similar to a camera flash)i had seen on two previous occasions.

fyi: my friends and i often gather on my porch in the late evening to listen to music, philosophize, and enjoy the night-time sky. we are not ufo watchers, except for the mufon member.
content.summary: Bright-white horizontal streak across the sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend & i were driving to turon, ks to go to the liquor store that closes at 8:00pm on sunday. we had traveled north of penalosa, ks and had turned back to the west on 21st street. it is a paved country road. 4 deer had just crossed the road in front of us so we were on the lookout for more deer. my friends headlights point down some so it was really dark out. there were no other cars on the road, just us. suddenly a brilliant green light flashed into our windshield. it only lasted a couple of seconds and then it was gone. we both looked at each other and said "did u see that?!! what was that green flash?!!! we both saw it! we don't know what it was, but it was very strange. we didn't seem to have any loss of time or mechanical malfunctions. we just kept traveling to our destination. we didn't see any craft in the air, but it was so dark out on that country road. it seemed to be pretty close to the ground. do you have any ideas as to what this could  have been? i've seen spotlights on police helicopters and that was not what this was! thank you for your time on this matter.   k jones & d robinson
content.summary: Brilliant green flash into the windshield

content.detailedDescription: I work as a technician for at&t and i was traveling south on i 880 from hayward to fremont and i noticed a cigar shaped object that appeared to be at a 45 degree angle above the earth in my approximation to be above the east foothills of san jose or mt. hamilton area. it first appeared as a long cigar shaped object then as i kept watching it changed into a ball of light pinpoint then it faded from view. this all happened in the course of 3 minutes from 11:20 am to 11:23 am. i tried to see other motorists also saw it but was not sure if others had seen it as well. this is the first time that i have ever seen something like this. when it was it's long cigar shape it was a whitish grey then turned into a ball that looked like a star in the mid morning sky.It wasn't spectacular looking but it was definitely not a vapor trail of an airplane from what i could tell. i don't know what it was but i am curious if anyone else saw it.  thanks,   steve
content.summary: Long cigar shaped at 45 degree angle from earth. above east san jose near mt. hamilton

content.detailedDescription: Ufo shows up on blue hill web cam see this and other cams at http://webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Ufo shows up on blue hill web cam. more--    http://webcamufo.Com

content.detailedDescription:
Looks like a global hawk uav to me.

i live in eastern kentucky, and i actually have hi-8 video of predator and global hawk uav's in transit over my area.

they fly over all the time on cap duty.
content.summary: For the kentucky ufo pic poster...

content.detailedDescription:
Well me and my girl friend was out side bout 11:30 and she saw a bright light the we both looked it was moving so slow the like 10mins past then it like went so fast like it hit light speed and it left a mark in the dark sky
now every other night it comes back to the same place center of the sky were we live
content.summary: Very bright light sphere movein slow then it gos in to light speed !!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving sesame place with a friend and her son on saturday 10/18/08. we were leaving the park and walking towards the parking lot when i happened to look up and saw a white plane-like object that was silent, unmarked, had no wings but a tail "fin" fly across the sky from west to east over the trees across from the theme park at the normal speed of an airplane. since it had no wings, i was instantly fascinated but a large tree on my path blocked my view as i watched it. i moved over in less than two seconds to have a better view and saw the object must have turned north and then came back down on a north to southeast angle, now flying in the direction of the old don pablo's. i did not see it turn from the original direction and wondered how it got so far north after being closer to me. it was odd seeing a plane-like object with no wings and it held my attention as i wondered how it ever got off the ground. it appeared to be the size of a normal passenger plane but was solid with no windows and all white. i was speechless and when i glanced at my friend and then back up to the sky it was gone. after this happened, i recalled seeing this same object. i realized i saw it on this website, sketched by a gentleman who saw this object with two other objects. i only saw it by itself but it was exactly as he sketched it and described. this event did not scare me, but i was surprised at how much i was drawn to watch it pass overhead and was disappointed that i lost it when i looked away.
content.summary: A silent, white, unmarked airplane-like object without wings but with a tail was seen flying in the sky from the sesame place parking lot.

content.detailedDescription: It was during a summer night in front of my house and i had come back from college where i was studying astronomy. i was showing my buddy the constellations in the sky. as we were looking at the constellations we began to identify moving lights. we saw satellites traveling across the sky as they appeared as "non-twinkling" star sized lights. we also identified airplanes which always seemed to have some type of blinking red beacon light. we knew they were planes because we could hear the sound of the engines finally reaching us. as we continued looking at constellations in the sky, we then noticed a light far away moving toward us. thinking nothing of it, we were trying to think of what kind of plane it might be. as the light got closer, we noticed it didn't appear to make any sound like we heard with previous planes. we began to anticipate the sound to reach us at any moment. as the light moved closer and closer the light started to get bigger. i then realized this object didn't have any blinking lights on it like the planes we identified previously. it was a surreal moment. as it flew over us, we were struck with awe. the best way i can describe it was that it was shaped like a boomerang and was probably about 50 yards wide. i would guess that it was probably flying at about 150 to 200 feet above us and moving at about 40 mph. it didn't make any unusual movements or aerobatics. it just flew in what appears to be a straight path. the object was emitting a white bright light from the entire surface of its body as if it was one whole light. the light was very similar to quality of light a full moon would produce, but strangely, it didn't light up anything as a full moon would do on a clear night. and i thought i was hearing a very low sound coming from it, almost bordering the lower limit of my hearing range, but wasn't sure. it continued to fly over us and off in the distance. we lost visual contact with it because of the near by houses. we both looked at each other in disbelief. we later went down to a small valley area called "ogle tree gap" which was near my house where we could continued to view constellations. on our way to ogle tree gap, we kept wondering if it was some type of experimental craft from ft. hood, which was a near by military base. but as we got there about 15 min later after the event, we noticed about a dozen helicopters flying around in formation with search lights on. we then immediately left and went home and called it a night. the next day i was hoping to find something in the local paper or on the news about what we both had experienced to kind of clarify out thoughts. i found nothing. i haven't spoke about this in over 10 years until recently. i have searched for the object since then on the internet. even stories but i have found nothing at this point that is identical to what i experienced.
content.summary: Boomerang object.

content.detailedDescription: I had steped out inyo my back yard to smoke a cigareete. couldnt sleep. noticed a yellow and blue light that seemed out of place in the sky. a small person like thing appeared before me aboput 15 foot away from me.  i imediatley felt out of sorts, like i was about to fall down and had no strenght. sort of grougy. with out opening its small mouth it let me know it wasnt going to hurt me and he would be with me until i was returned. i must have blacked out and the next thing i remembered was laying on a table ina large oval shaped room. sort of like a horseshoe. the one that came to me was there. i begged him not to drug me or whatever. i wanted to remember everything. i turned to the others and agreed since i wasnt going nuts on them. they checked and took samples from every hole in my body. they wrent real happy with what they got from out back. made noises of displeasure i guess at the smell. they stuck probes in my nose , mouth and penis and extracted some fluid. i pretty sure it was sprem. i asked them way they were doing all this. it took a while for them to answer, and rember the never made but a few sounds, i heard the answers in my head. i wanted to know where they were from and they showed me a chart i really didnt understand. but explained that we could not ever reach them because of the differance of our time and theres. the called theres c -time. i dont know wht they meant. i was lead to a window and looked out. we where far above the earth. and i could see the lights outlining certain areas that was reconizable. they explained that they needed our help if the were to survive. there race was dieing out slowly and they needed to biologcally combine our makeup to blend eith theres so they could reporduce. i was then lead to a table and they had a bright green light pass just over my body. i was told of the problems i would have with my physical body. over the past twenty years they have all come true. they also told me the time of my death. and of a time that they would be known to everyone. they need our help and for that help wiether we give it frrely or not they are going to protect our earth. 2013 will be the year that changes everthing for us, we will then know that we are but a speck in the sky to whats really out there. i have been visted since and remember each encounter clearly. i was told to let someone know of there visits, they told me they would have others reveil ther contacts too. there not coming to due us harm. and they also have made it clear that they have been helpling us all along with knowledge of our leadrs. they where upset that they had not been reveiled to all of us and the keeping of the secret was not part of there aggreement.
